title: Overheal Rune Question
body:
Garen's passive restores MAX health per second, not missing health per second, according to the wiki.
Does this mean the Overheal rune in the Precision tree will work with Garen's passive, letting him just maintain the overheal shield out of combat?

replies.body: I don't believe regeneration effects occur while at full hp, so for better or worse I do not think this would work
